title: Voksenåsen
text:
Voksenåsen is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> and <a href="neighborhood">neighborhood</a> in <a href="Vestre%20Aker">Vestre Aker</a> borough in Oslo, Norway.
Education.
Down towards <a href="Bogstad">Bogstad</a> is the Grindbakken primary school. With the exception of Voksentoppen Skole, a special school for children with disabilities, no other schools are located in the area. Middle-School students from the area walk, bike, drive or take the train down to Midtstuen School, while one has to go closer to the center of Oslo to find the nearest high school.
